text.p: Metal Management Inc, a scrap metal recycling company, said Tuesday it completed its acquisition of The Isaac Group of Cos, based in Toledo, Ohio.

Shareholders of Isaac Group received 1.9 million shares of Metal Management's common stock, warrants to purchase 462,500 shares of Metal Management's common stock, $20.6 million of short-term notes, and $16.0 million of long-term notes.
In addition, Metal Management has guaranteed $8.5 million of short-term notes of the Isaac Group payable to two of the Isaac Group's shareholders, the company said.

Isaac Group is a 98-year-old group of companies, including Ferrex Trading Corp and The Isaac Corp, the largest briquetter of recycled ferrous metals in the world, and a major recycling operation with estimated annualized gross revenues of $175 million.
Metal Management shares were unchanged at 13 Tuesday.
